name.str: pair of XL magical armored stone gauntlets
name.str_pl: pairs of XL magical armored stone gauntlets

description: A magical flexible stonelike substance for protection and attack.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A magical slick icy coating on your feet.  While quite fast on flat floors, they make it difficult to move on rough terrain.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A large pouch of tough flesh on your back, filled with tiny tentacles that grasp and hold anything you place inside.  It shifts and adjusts itself to minimize encumbrance.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
